vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.16.3;
son of: Heber (H2268);
brother of: Shomer (H7763H), Hotham (H2369) and Shua (H7774);
father of: Pasach (H6457), Bimhal (H1118) and Ashvath (H6220)
Group of yaph.let (יַפְלֵט "Japhlet" H3310)
§ Japhleti see Japhlet = "let him escape"
descendants of Asher of the family of Japhlet who lived on the southwest border of Ephraim. Used as location
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jaflet, hijo de Héber; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
押利提人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "讓他逃脫"
住在以法蓮西南邊界, 押利提家族亞設的後裔 #書 16:3|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
押利提人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "让他逃脱"
住在以法莲西南边界, 押利提家族亚设的后裔 #书 16:3|
